definitions.definition: A person or animal that runs away or has run away; a person, animal, or organization that escapes captivity or restrictions .
examples: Runaways are vulnerable to criminal exploitation.

definitions.definition: A vehicle (especially, a train ) that is out of control .
An object or process that is out of control or out of equilibrium .
The act of running away , especially of a horse or teams .

examples: The home side won in a runaway .

main_definition: A person or animal that runs away or has run away; a person, animal, or organization that escapes captivity or restrictions .
secondary_definitions: A vehicle (especially, a train ) that is out of control .
( usually attributive ) An object or process that is out of control or out of equilibrium .
The act of running away , especially of a horse or teams .
